analyzed: hāratīstotram

analyzed: śrī hāratīdevyaiḥ namaḥ  kunda prasūna sadṛśīm rucira aṅgarāgām

analyzed: yakṣeśvarīm bahu sutām praṇamāmi bhaktyā

analyzed: āliṅgitām nijam a savya bhujena putrān

analyzed: netraiḥ tribhiḥ ca pariśobhita cāru dehām

analyzed: nānāvidhaiḥ maṇi gaṇaiḥ racitam kirīṭam

analyzed: duḥkha apahām jana manohara bhoga bhājām

analyzed: yakṣeśvarīm bahu sutām praṇamāmi bhaktyā
translated: I devoutly bow to the many-breasted queen of the Yakshas.

analyzed: saṃtrāsinīm piśuna vṛttivatām janānām

analyzed: yakṣeśvarīm bahu sutām praṇamāmi bhaktyā
translated: I devoutly bow to the Yakshini, the mother of many children.

analyzed: buddha anuśāsana ratām ati sūkṣma rūpām

translated: Whose feet are worshipped in the three worlds, full of the light of compassion,

analyzed: gandharva kinnara gaṇaiḥ parisevyamānām
translated: Served by the hosts of Gandharvas and Kinnaras,
